descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/images/10163-1-1329521326.png[/img]

[b]Hello again.[/b]
As i promise, new version of Farkas. No more warpaint or dirty. New hairstyle. Deep black hair colour. Companion armour as default.

[i]Sorry for my english.[/i]

[/center]

[b]Future plan[/b]
Vilkas with warpaint version (2 wariants)
Farkas with warpaint version (2 wariant)
And i have done J\'Zargo Puss In Boots like, but unfortunetly, becose of this head/body skin bug, i cant add him : / He has red body, and grey head. At the momment i cant do nothing with this.
Female Better Look for all man. 
Ulfric and Brynjolf better look.
